    Title: Individual

      • distHamming

        public int distHamming(Individual ind,
                       int BITS_GEN)
        Computes the Hamming distance with the Individual given as a argument. In case a transformation from float representation to string is needed, the argument BITS_GEN will guide the process.
        Parameters:
        ind - Individual given to compute the distance.
        BITS_GEN - Number of bits to guide the transformation of representation.
        Returns:
        Hamming distance with the Individual given.

      • Hux

        public void Hux(Individual indiv)
        Crosses the individuals using the HUX operator. Exactly half of the different bits are flipped. The results are stored in each Individual object, the method caller and the argument.
        Parameters:
        indiv - Individual to cross with.

      • xPC_BLX

        public void xPC_BLX(Individual indiv,
                    double d)
        Crosses the individuals using the BLX operator. The results are stored in each Individual object, the method caller and the argument.
        Parameters:
        indiv - Individual to cross with.
        d - proportion of the diference of each gene that BLX will allow to exceed.

      • generateRB

        public RuleBase generateRB()

        Generates the Rule Base with adjusted to the optimization done.

        Returns:
        RuleBase The whole FARCHD rule set

        public void evaluate()

        Evaluate this individual (fitness function)
